definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Stratigraphy studies the sequence of the rocks in the earth's crust .
sentences.chinese: 地层学研究地壳中岩石的层序。

sentences.english: Suitable for soft to medium hard Non-abrasive formation.
sentences.chinese: 适应于软到中硬非研磨性地层。

sentences.english: Their characteristic is that they can isolate layers selectively.
sentences.chinese: 使用双封隔器选择性封隔地层是这两种仪器的特色。

sentences.english: He tried to guess how the strata behaved at the time the contortions formed .
sentences.chinese: 他试图推断地层在扭曲形成时是如何变化的。

sentences.english: The method is suitable for character of six-arm dipmeter.
sentences.chinese: 该方法适用于六臂地层倾角测井仪器的特点。

sentences.english: Wellbore and formation are connected by Ramey heat-transfer coefficient.
sentences.chinese: 井筒和地层的温度通过综合热传导系数联系起来。

sentences.english: The ages of rocks between these two were little more than guesswork.
sentences.chinese: 在这两者之间的地层年代基本都是靠猜测。

sentences.english: The stratigraphic horizons have long been divided according to a lithostratigraphic boundary.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，地质分层采用岩石地层单位界面。

sentences.english: A large amount of Dinosaurs skeleton fossils are discovered in Upper Cretaceous strata at the Meipu Town, Yunxian County of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省郧县梅铺镇晚白垩世地层中发现大量恐龙化石。

sentences.english: It is placed in the formation via a fracture, frac-pack, gravel-pack, or pre- packed screen system.
sentences.chinese: 它通过裂缝或预填充筛管系统放置在地层中。

sentences.english: Inuduction responses result from nonlinear-time-variable filtering of formation properties.
sentences.chinese: 感应测井响应是地层非线性时变滤波的结果。

sentences.english: Therefore, the lithological information can be gained from seismic reflection waves.
sentences.chinese: 从地震反射中可以提取相应的地层和岩性信息。

sentences.english: The latter one formed as sulfides and gossan.
sentences.chinese: 后者系岩体与地层接触，形成硫化物或铁帽。

sentences.english: The genetic stratigraphic framework and model for the lake basin filling are constructed in terms of temporal-spatial distribution and tectonic-strati.
sentences.chinese: 对其成因地层格架及湖盆充填模式进行了探讨分析。

sentences.english: The deposits are grouped close to the present-day erosional edge of Kombolgie Formation rocks.
sentences.chinese: 矿床集中于靠近科姆波尔吉地层岩的现代侵蚀前沿。

sentences.english: The second member of Qugasi Formation is the ore-bearing strata.
sentences.chinese: 赋矿地层为曲嘎寺组第二段。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
